title: Marc Chagall America Windows Silk Tie
description:
Tie developed from Marc Chagall’s America Windows, 1977, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

The celebratory energy of the whirling figures from Marc Chagall's (French, b. Russia, 1887–1985) America Windows will sustain you until you can loosen your tie and join the party. 100% silk.

  • Dimensions: 57 in.
  • Material: 100% silk
  • Dry clean only.

*This item cannot be shipped to a destination outside the United States.
